sqlMap.select: SELECT count(cscode) count FROM cart WHERE userid=#userid# and cscode=#cscode#
sqlMap.update: update cart set amount=#amount# where userid=#userid# and cscode=#cscode#
sqlMap.delete: delete from cart where userid=#userid# and cscode=#cscode#
sqlMap.select: select l.ocode,to_char(odate,'yyyy-mm-dd') odate,pname,'-'||usepoint point from orderList l, orderMain m,product p where l.ocode=m.ocode and l.cscode=p.cscode and userid=#userid# union select l.ocode,to_char(odate,'yyyy-mm-dd') odate,pname,'+'||savepoint point from orderList l, orderMain m,product p where l.ocode=m.ocode and l.cscode=p.cscode and userid=#userid# order by ocode desc
select sum(savepoint) from orderList l,ordermain m where l.ocode=m.ocode and userid=#userid#
select ablepoint from memberinfo where userid=#userid#

select b.* from( select rownum rn,a.* from( SELECT unq unq, title title, content content, hit hit, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate FROM review WHERE userid=#userid#
AND $searchCondition$ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY unq DESC ) a ) b where rn > $firstIndex$ and rn <= $lastIndex$

SELECT count(unq) FROM review WHERE userid=#userid#
AND $searchCondition$ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY unq DESC

select b.* from( select rownum rn,a.* from( SELECT unq unq, title title, content content, hit hit, to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate FROM qna WHERE userid=#userid#
AND $searchCondition$ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY unq DESC ) a ) b where rn > $firstIndex$ and rn <= $lastIndex$

AND $searchCondition$ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY unq DESC

select cname||' '||discountrate||'% 할인' coupon, applymoney||'원 이상 주문 시 사용가능' subject1, '최대 '||maxDiscmoney||'원 할인 가능' subject2,sdate||'~'||edate usedate from couponList l, coupon c where c.CCODE = l.CCODE and userid=#userid# and sysdate<edate

select userid,c.cscode,c.pcode,pname,price,amount,filename,substr(c.cscode,7,1) cssize,substr(c.cscode,8) cscolor,round(price*0.001) savepoint from cart c, product p where userid=#userid# and c.cscode=p.cscode
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM memberinfo WHERE userid=#userid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO memberinfo ( userid , name , pwd , birthday , gender , post , phone , email , emailreceive , phonereceive , ablepoint , joindate ) VALUES ( #userid# , #name# , #pwd# , #birthday# , #gender# , #post# , #phone# , #email# , #emailreceive# , #phonereceive# , '1000' , sysdate )
sqlMap.select: SELECT count(*) cnt FROM memberinfo WHERE userid=#userid# AND pwd=#pwd#

SELECT userid , name , pwd , to_char(birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD') birthday , gender , post , phone , email , emailreceive , phonereceive , ablepoint , to_char(joindate,'YYYY-MM-DD') joindate FROM memberinfo WHERE userid=#userid#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM memberinfo WHERE pwd=#pwd# AND userid=#userid#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE memberinfo SET pwd = #pwd# , birthday = #birthday# , gender = #gender# , post = #post# , phone = #phone# , email = #email# , emailreceive = #emailreceive# , phonereceive = #phonereceive# WHERE userid = #userid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM couponlist WHERE userid=#userid#
SELECT NVL(SUM(totalmoney),0) total FROM ordermain WHERE userid=#userid#

SELECT m.userid userid , m.ocode ocode , p.cscode cscode , p.pname pname , to_char(m.odate,'YYYY-MM-DD') odate FROM (SELECT userid, ocode, odate FROM ordermain WHERE userid = #userid#) m, orderlist l, product p WHERE m.ocode = l.ocode AND l.pcode = p.pcode ORDER by m.odate DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM memberinfo WHERE name=#name# AND email=#email#
